resources.string: Home screen \nIncludes the app logo and three interactable buttons.
Discovery activity \nActivity, where the user can interact with the application to search for new music and browse different songs suggested to him or her. \nSearch bar has no functionality yet.

Playlist activity \nThis opens when the playlists button in the main activity is pressed. The activity will include playlists the user has saved and an option to add new ones. \nAdding playlist function has not yet been implemented.
Now Playing Activity \nThis Acticity opens up when the user pushes the Play button or any of the albums or playlists. \nNo media player class for actual playback has not yet been implemented"
